H0.text: Field mouse, grass, hawk snake is the list of organisms in the correct order from producer to top-level consumer in an ecosystem.

H1.text: Snake, field mouse, hawk, grass is the list of organisms that is in the correct order from producer to top-level consumer in an ecosystem.

H2.text: Grass, field mouse, snake, hawk is the correct order of organisms in an ecosystem from producer to top-level consumer.

H3.text: Snake, grass, field mouse, hawk is the list of organisms in the correct order from producer to topâ€‘level consumer in an ecosystem.

A6.text: The primary food chain is the energy coming from autotrophs and passed on to the consumers; and the second major food chain is when carnivores eat the herbivores or decomposers that consume the autotrophic energy.

A7.text: Consumers are broken down into primary consumers, secondary consumers and tertiary consumers.
